title: deleting my account
body: i just made this account i was going to have the summoner name i wanted cause it said it was avalible and i clicked yes over and over and it never worked so i tryed sssssssss and it told me to try a suggestion so i did and it worked now im stuck with this name help please!!!!

replies.body:
If you'd like this account deleted, you'll need to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
